import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update a secret"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/v1beta/secrets/default/keys/{key}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update an existing secret in the default provider (encrypted provider only)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Secret key","in":"path","name":"key","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"Request to update an existing secret","properties":{"value":{"description":"New secret value","type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"v1.updateSecretRequest"}}},"description":"Update secret request","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"Response after updating a secret","properties":{"key":{"description":"Secret key that was updated","type":"string"},"message":{"description":"Success message","type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"v1.updateSecretResponse"}}},"description":"OK"},"400":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}},"description":"Bad Request"},"404":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}},"description":"Not Found - Provider not setup or secret not found"},"405":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}},"description":"Method Not Allowed - Provider doesn't support writing"},"500":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}},"description":"Internal Server Error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
